---
title: "File Outputs Report"
subtitle: "`r params$project`"
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%d %B, %Y %H:%M %Z')`"
params:
  project: ""
  outputsDF: NULL
output: pdf_document
header-includes:
    - \usepackage{caption}
---
  
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

params$outputsDF %>% 
  pmtables::st_new() %>% 
  pmtables::st_hline(from = "File") %>% 
  pmtables::st_clear_reps(File) %>% 
  pmtables::st_left(File = pmtables::col_ragged(6.25)) %>% 
  pmtables::st_left(`Output(s)` = pmtables::col_ragged(5)) %>% 
  pmtables::st_left(`Up to...date?` = pmtables::col_ragged(2)) %>% 
  pmtables::st_notes_rm() %>% 
  pmtables::st_sizes(col = 4) %>% 
  pmtables::stable_long(lt_cap_text = "Outputs by file") %>% 
  pmtables::st_asis()
```
